resources.string: Credits to the creator Ori Roitzaid, and to Albert Levy and Itzhak Ben Shitrit the great teachers.
Credits to Makif Zain School where I learn today, and where I got this assignment.
Credits to Android Studio that I use their platform to develop this app, and more many apps than this.
All the right reserved to Ori Roitzaid and Albert Levy.\n\nI also want to thank my parents that bring we to where I am today.
